description: This table contains the unique IDs of insurance buckets that are attached to hospital accounts.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INSURANCE_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the insurance bucket that is associated with this hospital account.
